name: WTFGAMEJAM 2016 Super Whack A Mole
description:
Left Click to interact
Mousewheel to scroll
'R' to reset progress from main screen

This is my entry for the WTF Game Jam 2016. In discussing what to do for the jam I settled on making a modern version of a classic game for VR. I wasn't able to target VR for the build so it's a classic game for mouse. This is Whack A Mole with progression and a win state.
